alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie; Southern Twin Falls County; Upper Weiser River; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 2:20PM MST until December 26 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. After a short break this evening snow will increase again late tonight. Total accumulation of 2 to 4 inches, except 6 to 12 inches over the mountains, through Saturday night. Wind gusts to 30 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow and reduced visibility. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Oregon and south central, southwest and west central Idaho. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Camas Prairie; Southern Twin Falls County; Upper Weiser River; Western Magic Valley
